short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get informed about your House representative's voting record every time you read a news article on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When reading a news article, just click the TMR button to a see a bill in Congress related to the topic of the article. You'll also see how your House Representative voted on it, as well as a summary of votes by party. You can also get a full page view of up to four relevant bills, so you can get a broader sense of your representative's record on that issue.
